FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Heavy Conscription
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A large number of the populace is conscripted into the settlement's military forces. -50% happiness gain, +50% unrest gain, +2 military level in each settlement.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Volunteer Service
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: The military force of your settlements is by volunteers only. +20% combat efficiency, -25% unrest gain, -25% loyalty lost.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: A Faction Disarmed
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: There is very little, if any trained military forces in the faction. -40% combat efficiency, +10% tax gain.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Slave Army
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: The majority of your settlements' military forces is comprised of slaves or those in forced servitude. -20% combat efficiency, +1 military level in each settlement.
